name: Whispers Of Death
description:
This is a FPS game meant for survival. You are shot down by an enemy ship and crash on an Island that was destroyed years ago, but the enemy has the Island filled with defenses. The game will give you hints on what to do to Win The Game. Can you survive the enemy and take him down or will you suffer death.

PS: On the Intro Scene with the Logo, it takes a while to load between scenes. Just left click mouse when the screen is black and it will load.

Thank You, Good Luck, & Enjoy
